title: Teacher Design Expertise Development: Online Workshops Based on an Ecological Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of basic instructional methods and instructional design experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning conducted in a smartphone-based LMS environment, allowing teachers to learn in time units during their work duties.

learning_goals: Learners can create design documents for at least three technology-enhanced learning modules by applying the five-stage ecological framework (context analysis, resource restructuring, activity design, feedback collection, iterative improvement).
Learners can ensure the pedagogical validity of designed learning activities through peer review in a peer assessment system, achieving a peer verification rate of over 80%.
Learners can create more than five interactive learning materials using open-source tools (e.g., Canva, Genially) accessible in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
